statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT project_name, emission_reduction FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_reduction DESC;
SELECT project_name, energy_source FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_reduction > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT MAX(emission_reduction) AS max_reduction_value FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_reduction > 50 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, energy_source, emission_reduction FROM carbon_emissions WHERE energy_source IN ('Solar', 'Wind') ORDER BY emission_reduction ASC;
SELECT id, project_name, project_description FROM carbon_emissions WHERE LENGTH(project_description) > 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT project_name, emission_reduction FROM carbon_emissions WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' OR project_name LIKE '%D' ORDER BY emission_reduction DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(emission_reduction) AS total_reduction FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY project_name HAVING SUM(emission_reduction) > 100;
SELECT id, initiative_name, emission_reduction, start_date, end_date FROM CarbonEmissionReductions WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT initiative_name, emission_reduction FROM CarbonEmissionReductions WHERE emission_reduction > 100
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives WHERE location = 'California' AND type = 'Solar'
SELECT id, initiative_name, location FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT AVG(capacity) AS average_capacity FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives
SELECT id, initiative_name, emission_reduction FROM CarbonEmissionReductions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives WHERE type='Solar' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT MAX(emission_reduction) AS max_reduction, AVG(emission_reduction) AS avg_reduction FROM CarbonEmissionReductions;
SELECT initiative_name, location, type, capacity FROM RenewableEnergyInitiatives WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarbonEmissionReductions WHERE end_date < current_date();
SELECT * FROM CarbonReduction;
SELECT project_name, initiative_type, emissions_reduction FROM CarbonReduction WHERE date_completed > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, initiative_type, emissions_reduction FROM CarbonReduction WHERE emissions_reduction > 100;
SELECT project_name, date_completed FROM CarbonReduction ORDER BY date_completed DESC;
SELECT project_name, initiative_type FROM CarbonReduction WHERE initiative_type = 'Renewable Energy' AND emissions_reduction > 50;
SELECT * FROM CarbonReduction;
SELECT project_name, emissions_reduction, date_completed FROM CarbonReduction WHERE initiative_type = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT source_name, capacity_installed, location FROM EnergySources WHERE source_type = 'Solar';
SELECT participant_id, project_id, participant_name, role FROM ProjectParticipants WHERE participant_name LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT project_name, emissions_reduction FROM CarbonReduction ORDER BY date_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT initiative, emission_reduction FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_reduction > 50;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM initiatives_relationship ORDER BY carbon_emission_id DESC;
SELECT id, date, emission_amount FROM emission_tracking WHERE emission_source = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE location='California';
SELECT initiative, emission_reduction FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_reduction > 50 ORDER BY emission_reduction DESC;
SELECT carbon_emission_id, COUNT(carbon_emission_id) AS total_count FROM initiatives_relationship GROUP BY carbon_emission_id;
SELECT date, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM emission_tracking WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT initiative_name, reduction_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE achieved_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, location FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_name, emission_rate FROM emissions_sources ORDER BY emission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE reduction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY achieved_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, reduction_amount, achieved_date FROM carbon_emissions WHERE achieved_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, emission_rate FROM emissions_sources WHERE emission_rate >= 50 ORDER BY source_name;
SELECT project_id, SUM(reduction_amount) AS total_reduction FROM emissions_tracking GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_reduction > 5000;
